amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Corps of Engineers Operation and Maintenance account by $184,241,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 25 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funds for the Operation and Maintenance by $184,241,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Westmoreland amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 77 - 350 (Roll no. 505).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Westmoreland.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Westmoreland amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 77 - 350 (Roll no. 505).
